definitions.definition: To restrain within boundaries; to limit; to confine
definitions.example: After suffering diahrroea, the patient was restricted to a diet of rice, cold meat, and yoghurt.

definitions.definition: (specifically) To consider (a function) as defined on a subset of its original domain.
Available only to certain authorized groups of people.
Only available to customers who do not belong to racial, ethnic or religious minorities.
definitions.example: This hotel is restricted: no Blacks.
